root: ^That’s not what you said and we both know this kid. Tell me what you want?
^Well, how to put this… I am a friend of Khalid the Healer, you know him right?
^Everyone knows him. Tell me what’s good?
^Just looking for a man with an amber necklace. I heard he is hanging around here at this time of day.
^(he points his finger to one sly looking guy)You mean Tahir? He is over there.
^(shrugs his shoulder and attends to a customer)
